item.title: 🦀 alphastrata/DunMaoSSSP (58 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: alphastrata

📝 Repository: alphastrata/DunMaoSSSP

📄 Descrizione: A ~mvp~ Rust implementation of the DunMao et al breakthrough? deterministic algorithm for Single-Source Shortest Paths (SSSP) that breaks the O(m + n log n) sorting barrier on directed graphs. Based on the 2025 paper by Duan, Mao and collaborators from Tsinghua University.
